plot: Ryūgamine Mikado is a boy who longs for the exciting life of the big city. At the invitation of his childhood friend Masaomi, he transfers to a school in Ikebukuro. Masaomi has warned him about people he doesn't want to cross in the city: a champion fighter, an informant, and a mysterious gang called "Dollars." Nervous from Masaomi's stories, Mikado witnesses an urban legend on his first day in the city, the Headless Rider astride a black motorcycle. From then on, the existence of supernatural cases and a gang called the Yellow Scarves will rise to the surface, and Ikebukuro will pushed to the breaking point.
opening_theme: "Uragiri no Yūyake" (裏切りの夕焼け; Betrayal of the Sunset) by Theatre Brook (eps 1-12)
"Complication" (コンプリケイション) by ROOKiEZ is PUNK'D (eps 13-24)
